projects.title: Ticker App
projects.description: Serverless finance App made with React Router, hooks, and Chart.js.

projects.title: Clickyz
projects.description: Interactive mechanical keyboard editor. This was made using a custom 3D keyboard model and p5.js for interactivity. A personal project displaying my appreciation for hand made things.

projects.title: HearthStone Deck Builder
projects.description: SPA deck builder that dynamically displays card data & grants users the ability to build decks. This utilizes a standalone API, and also sources data in from a 3P API.

projects.title: Sidetrack
projects.description: Server-side rendered Reddit clone. This was a Flatiron project demonstrating key Rails fundamentals.
